name: Crystal Goblin Storm
description:
Keep your Crown Crystal alive! EXPLOSIONS! Customize your weapons! Code, Music and SFX: @Hermitao https://twitter.com/Hermitao10 Art and Level Design: @Greon https://twitter.com/Greon8

Objective: Keep your Crown Crystal alive from bloodthirsty goblins for 6 waves.
Instructions:
Press 2 for the rocket launcher, 1 for the assault rifle.
Left mouse click to fire.
WASD to move, Space to jump.
Escape to return to main menu

Ludum Dare 46 page:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/crystal-goblin-storm
